scripts.buildWin: (electron-packager ./ edit --build-version=1.6 --ignore=^/output --icon="icon.ico" --platform="win32" --win32metadata.CompanyName="Quan's Home" --win32metadata.FileDescription="Edit Program is now a native program" --win32metadata.ProductName="Edit Program (Native Program)") & (rename edit-win32-x64 edit-win32-1.6) & (7z a -tzip -mx9 -mm=Deflate edit-win32-1.6.zip edit-win32-1.6) & (rd /s /q edit-win32-1.6) & (move edit-win32-1.6.zip output) & (7z h -scrcsha1 output/edit-win32-1.6.zip) & (7z h -scrcsha256 output/edit-win32-1.6.zip)
scripts.buildLinux: (electron-packager ./ edit --build-version=1.6 --ignore=^/output --icon="icon.ico" --platform="linux") & (rename edit-linux-x64 edit-linux-1.6) & (7z a -tzip -mx9 -mm=Deflate edit-linux-1.6.zip edit-linux-1.6) & (rd /s /q edit-linux-1.6) & (move edit-linux-1.6.zip output) & (7z h -scrcsha1 output/edit-linux-1.6.zip) & (7z h -scrcsha256 output/edit-linux-1.6.zip)
scripts.buildBoth: (electron-packager ./ edit --build-version=1.6 --ignore=^/output --icon="icon.ico" --platform="win32" --win32metadata.CompanyName="Quan's Home" --win32metadata.FileDescription="Edit Program is now a native program" --win32metadata.ProductName="Edit Program (Native Program)") & (rename edit-win32-x64 edit-win32-1.6) & (7z a -tzip -mx9 -mm=Deflate edit-win32-1.6.zip edit-win32-1.6) & (rd /s /q edit-win32-1.6) & (move edit-win32-1.6.zip output) & (7z h -scrcsha1 output/edit-win32-1.6.zip) & (7z h -scrcsha256 output/edit-win32-1.6.zip) & (electron-packager ./ edit --build-version=1.6 --ignore=^/output --icon="icon.ico" --platform="linux") & (rename edit-linux-x64 edit-linux-1.6) & (7z a -tzip -mx9 -mm=Deflate edit-linux-1.6.zip edit-linux-1.6) & (rd /s /q edit-linux-1.6) & (move edit-linux-1.6.zip output) & (7z h -scrcsha1 output/edit-linux-1.6.zip) & (7z h -scrcsha256 output/edit-linux-1.6.zip)
